head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCKERLIE, JOHN V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCKERLIE, JOHN V.

block.p: McKERLIE-John V. 77, of Ft. Pierce, FL (formerly of Far Rockaway, NY) on August 8, 2000. Retired professional civil engineer. Beloved husband for 55 years of Gloria. Loving father of John Jr., Helen Marie Natt and Patti Channon. Dear brother of Judy Harris and Patricia Rapkoch. Proud grandfather of six grandchildren and one great granddaughter. Visiting Friday, 2-5 and 7-9:30 PM, at the Arthur F. White Funeral Home Inc., 234 Broadway, Bethpage, NY. Funeral Mass Saturday, 9:45 AM at St. Martin of Tours RC Church (Bethpage). Interment following at Calvary Cemetery, Woodside, NY.
